titleStmt.title: A copy of verses, containing, a catalogue of young wenches, which will be expos'd to sale by inch of candle, at the Cuckold's Coffee-House in Cucumber-Lane, and the Golden-Cabbage in Taylors-street. To the tune of, The forsaken lover. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P[hilip]. Brooksby, J[onah]. Deacon, J[osiah], [sic] Blare, and J[ohn]. Back.,

notesStmt.note: Date, place of publication and publishers' names from Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
